item.description:
*** Please RSVP by Friday so I can give a headcount to the restaurant.

 

Join us for an all you can eat dinner at the newly opened Maki Maki Woburn. Cost is $23.99 plus tax and gratuities.

http://makimakiwoburn.com/

How it works:

You'll be given a slip of paper to select what you would like to order (appetizers, sushi/sashimi, hot entree) which are then prepared fresh in the kitchen. There are also walk up buffets offering a variety of rolls and salads.

If you need a ride, please note that in your RSVP. Our members are pretty good about offering rides. Note which town and T stop you can meet at. Please feel free to contact each other to arrange carpools.

Plenty of free parking available.

And as always - please udpate your RSVP if your plans change.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Maki Maki Woburn
